bill.summary:
This resolution makes various statements related to the insurrection at the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021. Among other things, the resolution
determines that the Proud Boys have engaged in acts of domestic terrorism, including at the U.S. Capitol; adjudges that the insurrection involved acts of domestic terrorism; and condemns the instigating role of the Proud Boys organization in the insurrection.
